item.title: Godot 2D Basics: Underwater Shooter
item.description: In this video, we dive into the world of game development with Godot to create an exciting underwater shooter game. Follow along as we guide you through using Area2D and RigidBody2D to control a shark that fires swords, taking down various sea creatures in a Slavic art style. You'll learn how to set up the environment, animate characters, implement firing mechanics, and handle collisions. Whether you're a beginner or looking to expand your skills, this tutorial provides everything you need to create your own unique underwater adventure game.

item.title: Godot 2D Basics: Movement, Animation and Collision
item.description: In this video tutorial, we explore the fundamental concepts of 2D game development in Godot. Learn how to implement basic movement, create animations, and set up collision detection using GDScript. This guide is perfect for beginners and indie developers looking to get started with Godot's powerful 2D engine. Follow along as we walk through each step to bring your 2D game ideas to life!
